courseslist.title: Debate Fundamentals
courseslist.description: Online and in-person beginner debate classes for students of all ages.

courseslist.title: Digital SAT Prep
courseslist.description: AI powered SAT learning platform and online SAT classes by experienced mentors.

courseslist.title: Custom programs
courseslist.description: Tournament prep, advanced personalized coaching, event organization, and more!

initiativeslist.title: Vietnam Women and Queer Open
initiativeslist.description: Since 2021, we have hosted this annual event to create a platform to discuss and advocate for issues regarding gender minorities. We have ran workshops, social media campaigns, discussions, and art displays about women and the LGBTQIA+ community.

initiativeslist.title: Echo Camp
initiativeslist.description: Week long annual debate camp teaching students from rural areas how to set up their own debate club. We hold workshops on how to train members, how to register for tournaments, raise funding, and host their own tournaments as well as networking events.

initiativeslist.title: Community Building
initiativeslist.description: We provide expertise, sponsorship, and organizational support for schools and student organizations looking to host their own debate tournaments. We have successfully supported over 40 student tournaments over the past 2 years.

initiativeslist.title: Disney British Parliamentary Open
initiativeslist.description: Charity tournament to raise fund for child protection organizations. We hosted the event alongside a social media campaign and had more than 200 attendees

aboutPageDescription: Learn about Moji's mission, story, and impact in the education sector.
aboutPageOgTitle: About Moji - Empowering Students to Learn
aboutPageKeywords: Moji, about us, mission, story, impact, education
missionStatement: At Moji, we believe that every student deserves to learn as much as they want, in any way they want to.
ourStoryDescription:
We are three students who successfully navigated the public school system and were fortunate to be admitted to the best state-sponsored specialized high school in the country. This opportunity opened doors to skills and experiences we never knew existed. These experiences led us to achieve four national championships in debate, numerous academic awards, and secured our admission to top colleges in the US.

After taking a gap year, we founded Moji to help students like us access the same opportunities and develop themselves fully. Our background as public school students allowed us to connect with students in ways that other companies cannot.
byTheNumbersDescription: In the last 4 years we have made considerable in our own development, as well as the advancement of our community. We are very proud to be considered one of the leading companies for competitive debate programs, a trusted partner for public and private institutions, and the biggest community development organization in Vietnam
coursesPageDescription: Explore our wide range of courses and programs.

debateFundamentalsPageDescription: Learn the fundamentals of debating and improve your critical thinking skills.
debateFundamentalsPageOgTitle: Debate Fundamentals Course - Enhance Your Debating Skills
debateFundamentalsPageKeywords: debate fundamentals, debate course, debating skills, critical thinking
debateFundamentalsDescription: This course is offered throughout the year, in smaller class sizes from 5-10 students to ensure quality and personalized feedback. Middle School classes will be offered in English, and Highschool/College classes will be offered in Vietnamese. Contact us for more information, or click on the button to sign up.
courseHighlightsDescription: Moji have hosted this course for over 2 years, with many students moving on to higher levels after finding that the course was extremely beneficial to their lives in and out of school. We are also proud to say we have one of the most affordable courses in the country as well as financial aid for those in need.
courseStructureDescription: The Debate Fundamentals course is structured to provide a comprehensive learning experience. The course is divided into modules, each focusing on a specific aspect of debating. Students will engage in a mix of lectures, group discussions, and practical exercises to reinforce their understanding of the concepts taught. Throughout the course, students will have the opportunity to participate in mock debates and receive feedback from experienced mentors. Students will then have the opportunity to prepare and be accompanied to recommended tournaments
